# teamcity_group_member (Resource)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "teamcity_group_member" "developer_bob" {
  group_id = teamcity_group.developers.id
  user_id = teamcity_user.bob.id
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `group_id` (String)
- `user_id` (String)
